metadata.Title: CVE-2023-23006 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
In the Linux kernel before 5.15.13,drivers/net/ethernet/mellanox/mlx5/core/steering/dr_domain.c misinterpretsthe mlx5_get_uars_page return value (expects it to be NULL in the errorcase, whereas it is actually an error pointer).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-23006` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-22-generic - 5.15.0-22.22
linux-image-5.15.0-22-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-22.22
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-22-generic - 5.15.0-22.22
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-22-generic-64k - 5.15.0-22.22
No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-28-generic - 5.19.0-28.29~22.04.1
linux-image-5.19.0-28-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-28.29~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-28-generic - 5.19.0-28.29~22.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-28-generic-64k - 5.19.0-28.29~22.04.1
No subscription required

No subscription required
